Title: Lookin' at You, Kid
Plot: Jenny throws a party for the girls to get to meet their movie counterparts -- with mixed results. Shane stirs up drama between Dawn and Cindi, which escalates into bitter rivalry between The Planet and SheBar. Meanwhile, Alice is stunned by a basketball star's gay-bashing on national TV.
GuestStars: Kate French, Patricia Velasquez, Alicia Leigh Willis, Wendy Glenn, Angela Gots, Michelle Harrison, Amber Borycki, Dominic Zamprogna, Michael Daingerfield
